contentList.content: Has a -3 penalty to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
Insult a creature: it has a -3 penalty to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> made until the end of it's turn.

Your club, staff, mace, javelin, spear, sickle or flail becomes magical: it deals [1], and uses your best <LSTag Tooltip="SpellCastingAbilityModifier"> Spellcasting Ability</LSTag> for <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
